Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha A3000 Digital Camera (full package)
Reviews.Author: Joel Cantrell
Reviews.Content: I bought this Sony DSLR  for my wife "A Beginner",  :)I have a professional 35mm SLR - (way to much for a beginner to learn up front) !!The A3000 is a midline between a (point & shoot or phone camera & a full-size Pro SLR) ... Sooo easy to use.The view finder screen makes things simple too.The Sony  is lighter, it has adjustable settings or can shoot full auto = (simple point & shoot). It is 20mp & takes awesome pics..!!She is doing pics of our birds on the feeders with the zoom lens & night shots w/ the tripod in the snow w/ std. to wide angle lens... then looking at them & cropping them on the computer.She wants to frame some for home artwork ...... all in 30 days..!! She loves it.We received the entire kit package w/ both lenses for around $550.ish.  I have over $3k in my Olympus w/ less stuff & they both take quality pictures. I did apx. 10 hours on line research & looked at some in person at a few stores, The best deal I could find anywhere.
